body:
Comment 1: 
This program passes 2,424 bytes of arguments to scorefunc:
16 for pls[i], 2400 for the 600 ints in s, 8 for score.

We should probably raise the runtime limit (1024 bytes).
_Labels changed: added **packagechange**._ _Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
